did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1976-1977

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.791, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1979 September 10.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general and administrative committee files.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
SERIES I: General Records, 1976-1977, Boxes 1-27
SERIES II: Administrative Committees, 1976-1977, Boxes 28-29

did.unittitle: "A-Al" Miscellaneous--Acosta, H. re: Honor System; Henry Adams Papers; Adult Education Association; Albemarle County Fire Marshal re: Disposal of Wastes from Vivarium 1976-1977
